page.title: 07Oxted Pubs and Hotels.
page.content: There are 6 different pubs in Oxted: {THE BELL}has a small restaurant, a car park and a garden at the rear. {THE GEORGE}has a bar and a saloon. Opposite these 2 is{THE CROWN,}which is quite small, & has recently changed owners. Also in Old Oxted beside the river is{THE WHEATSHEAF. 2 pubs are built into the hotel, {THE HOSKINS.} On the first floor is a snack bar, & on the next 2 floors up, are bedrooms. The R.A.C & the A.A. have appointed it as a 2 star hotel. When you go in you see: a saloon bar, restaurant & 2 different bars . The building isn't very attractive & looks rather like a big water tank !{ THE { MORTIMERS}Hotel & Restaurant on West Hill is the only other hotel in Oxted. Outside Oxted there are some other pubs like{ THE HAYCUTTER} in Broadham Green &{THE BARLEY MOW}in Tandridge.
